tiers.1: Unicorn — Lottery / nearly impossible to find on shelf
tiers.2: Highly Allocated — Rare shelf finds, sell out in minutes
tiers.3: Allocated — Hard to find but possible with effort
tiers.4: Worth Tracking — High-rated, occasionally limited supply

bourbons.name: Pappy Van Winkle's Family Reserve 23 Year
bourbons.notes: The crown jewel. PA lottery only. Secondary market $3,000+.

bourbons.name: Pappy Van Winkle's Family Reserve 20 Year
bourbons.notes: PA lottery only. Secondary market $2,000+.

bourbons.name: Pappy Van Winkle's Family Reserve 15 Year
bourbons.notes: PA lottery only. Secondary market $1,500+.

bourbons.name: Old Rip Van Winkle 10 Year
bourbons.notes: PA lottery. Often considered best value in the Van Winkle line.

bourbons.name: Van Winkle Special Reserve 12 Year (Lot B)
bourbons.notes: PA lottery. Wheated bourbon, Lot B designation.

bourbons.name: George T. Stagg
bourbons.notes: BTAC release. Proof varies yearly. One of the highest-rated bourbons ever. PA lottery.

bourbons.name: William Larue Weller
bourbons.notes: BTAC release. Uncut, unfiltered wheated bourbon. PA lottery.

bourbons.name: Eagle Rare 17 Year
bourbons.notes: BTAC release. PA lottery.

bourbons.name: Thomas H. Handy Sazerac Rye
bourbons.notes: BTAC release. Uncut, unfiltered rye. Proof varies yearly. PA lottery.

bourbons.name: Sazerac 18 Year
bourbons.notes: BTAC release. PA lottery. Spring release in some years.

bourbons.name: E.H. Taylor Bottled-in-Bond (BTAC)
bourbons.notes: Added to BTAC lineup in 2025. PA lottery.

bourbons.name: Michter's 20 Year Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Extremely limited. One of the highest-rated bourbons in existence.

bourbons.name: Michter's 25 Year Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Ultra-rare. Secondary market $5,000+.

bourbons.name: W.L. Weller 12 Year
bourbons.notes: Wheated bourbon. Incredible value if found at MSRP.

bourbons.name: W.L. Weller Full Proof
bourbons.notes: Wheated bourbon at barrel proof. Highly sought.

bourbons.name: W.L. Weller C.Y.P.B.
bourbons.notes: Craft Your Perfect Bourbon. Fan-selected recipe.

bourbons.name: W.L. Weller Single Barrel
bourbons.notes: Wheated single barrel expression.

bourbons.name: E.H. Taylor Single Barrel
bourbons.notes: Bottled-in-Bond single barrel. Very limited distribution.

bourbons.name: E.H. Taylor Barrel Proof
bourbons.notes: Uncut, unfiltered. Proof varies by batch. Extremely allocated.

bourbons.name: E.H. Taylor Amaranth
bourbons.notes: Grain of the Gods edition. Uses amaranth grain in mashbill.

bourbons.name: Blanton's Gold
bourbons.notes: Higher proof than original. Was previously export-only.

bourbons.name: Blanton's Straight From The Barrel
bourbons.notes: Uncut, unfiltered. Barrel proof. Was export-only, now limited US release.

bourbons.name: Rock Hill Farms
bourbons.notes: Single barrel, same mashbill as Blanton's. Very limited.

bourbons.name: Elmer T. Lee Single Barrel
bourbons.notes: Named after the master distiller who created Blanton's. Once-annual release.

bourbons.name: Old Forester Birthday Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Released annually on September 2 (founder's birthday). Vintage-dated.

bourbons.name: Parker's Heritage Collection
bourbons.notes: Annual release. Different expression each year. Benefits ALS research.

bourbons.name: Four Roses Limited Edition Small Batch
bourbons.notes: Annual release. Unique blend of recipes each year.

bourbons.name: Kentucky Owl Confiscated
bourbons.notes: Named after confiscated barrels during Prohibition.

bourbons.name: Blanton's Original Single Barrel
bourbons.notes: The world's first single barrel bourbon. Iconic horse-stopper bottles.

bourbons.name: W.L. Weller Special Reserve
bourbons.notes: Entry-level Weller. Wheated bourbon. Great value if found at MSRP.

bourbons.name: W.L. Weller Antique 107
bourbons.notes: Wheated bourbon at 107 proof. Often called 'poor man's Pappy'.

bourbons.name: Eagle Rare 10 Year
bourbons.notes: Recently dropped age statement in some markets but still 10-year juice.

bourbons.name: E.H. Taylor Small Batch
bourbons.notes: Bottled-in-Bond. Most 'available' of the Taylor line.

bourbons.name: E.H. Taylor Straight Rye
bourbons.notes: Bottled-in-Bond rye. Allocated but findable.

bourbons.name: Booker's Bourbon (Annual Batches)
bourbons.notes: Multiple batches per year. Uncut, unfiltered. 'Jimmy's Batch' rated 96 by VinePair.

bourbons.name: Russell's Reserve 13 Year
bourbons.notes: Barrel proof. Released annually. Spring 2025 was 123.8 proof, rated 95.

bourbons.name: Maker's Mark Cellar Aged
bourbons.notes: Blended from cellar-aged barrels. Limited annual release.

bourbons.name: Maker's Mark FAE-02
bourbons.notes: Wood Finishing Series. French and American oak staves.

bourbons.name: Larceny Barrel Proof
bourbons.notes: Three batches per year (A, B, C). Wheated barrel proof. B525 rated 94 by VinePair.

bourbons.name: Bomberger's Declaration
bourbons.notes: Annual release from Michter's heritage brand. 2025 PFG edition rated 94.

bourbons.name: Old Fitzgerald Bottled-in-Bond Decanter
bourbons.notes: Spring and Fall releases. Wheated BiB in collectible decanter bottles.

bourbons.name: Michter's 10 Year Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Released periodically. Excellent quality.

bourbons.name: Michter's 10 Year Rye
bourbons.notes: Released periodically. Highly regarded rye.

bourbons.name: Michter's Toasted Barrel Finish Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Finished in a second toasted barrel. Very popular.

bourbons.name: Henry McKenna 10 Year BiB
bourbons.notes: Won Best in Show at SF World Spirits Competition. Single barrel BiB.

bourbons.name: Stagg Jr. / Stagg
bourbons.notes: Renamed from 'Stagg Jr.' to 'Stagg'. Barrel proof. Multiple batches per year.

bourbons.name: Buffalo Trace Kosher Wheat Recipe
bourbons.notes: Kosher-certified. Three expressions: wheat, rye, straight rye.

bourbons.name: WhistlePig Boss Hog
bourbons.notes: Annual limited release. Different finish each edition. XII rated 95.

bourbons.name: Jack Daniel's Single Barrel Barrel Proof
bourbons.notes: Uncut single barrel. Proof varies (125-140 range).

bourbons.name: Jack Daniel's Tanyard Hill Rye
bourbons.notes: High-proof rye. Rated 95 by VinePair.

bourbons.name: Woodford Reserve Master's Collection
bourbons.notes: Annual limited release. Different expression each year.

bourbons.name: Angel's Envy Cask Strength
bourbons.notes: Port barrel finished. Annual limited release.

bourbons.name: Wild Turkey Rare Breed
bourbons.notes: Barrel proof blend of 6, 8, and 12 year. Outstanding value.

bourbons.name: Wild Turkey Rare Breed Rye
bourbons.notes: Barrel proof rye. Excellent value.

bourbons.name: Knob Creek 12 Year
bourbons.notes: 100 proof, 12-year age statement. Becoming harder to find.

bourbons.name: Knob Creek 15 Year
bourbons.notes: Limited edition. 100 proof, 15 year. Excellent.

bourbons.name: Four Roses Single Barrel Private Selection
bourbons.notes: Store picks from 10 different recipes. Proof and age vary. Look for OBSV/OBSK/OESQ.

bourbons.name: Bardstown Bourbon Company Discovery Series
bourbons.notes: Blended bourbon series. Each batch is different. High quality.

bourbons.name: Bardstown Bourbon Company Fusion Series
bourbons.notes: Blend of their own distillate with sourced bourbon. Great value.

bourbons.name: New Riff Single Barrel Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Non-chill filtered, BiB. Kentucky craft distillery rising star.

bourbons.name: Smoke Wagon Uncut Unfiltered
bourbons.notes: MGP-sourced. Barrel proof. Cult following.

bourbons.name: Stellum Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Cask strength blend. Great value for proof.

bourbons.name: Barrell Bourbon (Batch Releases)
bourbons.notes: Numbered batch releases. Cask strength blends from multiple sources.

bourbons.name: Penelope Bourbon Barrel Strength
bourbons.notes: Four-grain bourbon. Rising popularity.

bourbons.name: Penelope Architect
bourbons.notes: Blended four-grain bourbon. Oak stave finished.

bourbons.name: Wilderness Trail Single Barrel Bourbon
bourbons.notes: BiB single barrel. Sweet mash process. Rising Kentucky craft star.

bourbons.name: Heaven Hill 7 Year BiB
bourbons.notes: Relaunched with new label. Outstanding value BiB.

bourbons.name: Early Times Bottled-in-Bond
bourbons.notes: Budget BiB sleeper. Hard to find in PA.

bourbons.name: Old Grand-Dad 114
bourbons.notes: High proof, high rye bourbon. Cult classic value pick.

bourbons.name: Old Forester 1920 Prohibition Style
bourbons.notes: Whiskey Row Series. Rich and full-bodied.

bourbons.name: Elijah Craig Barrel Proof
bourbons.notes: Three batches per year (A, B, C). 12 year barrel proof. Consistently top-rated.

bourbons.name: Elijah Craig Toasted Barrel
bourbons.notes: Finished in toasted new oak barrels. Limited but growing availability.

bourbons.name: Elijah Craig 18 Year Single Barrel
bourbons.notes: Very limited single barrel. Premium expression.

bourbons.name: Wild Turkey Kentucky Spirit
bourbons.notes: Single barrel selection from Wild Turkey. Underrated.

bourbons.name: Russell's Reserve Single Barrel
bourbons.notes: Non-chill filtered. Store picks are especially prized.

bourbons.name: Little Book (Annual Release)
bourbons.notes: Freddie Noe's blending series. Different theme each year.

bourbons.name: High West A Midwinter Night's Dram
bourbons.notes: Port-finished rye blend. Annual fall release. Cult following.

bourbons.name: High West Bourye
bourbons.notes: Bourbon-rye blend. Limited annual release.

bourbons.name: Jefferson's Ocean Aged at Sea
bourbons.notes: Aged aboard a ship. Multiple voyages. Unique concept.

bourbons.name: George Remus Repeal Reserve
bourbons.notes: Annual release. Series numbered. MGP-distilled.

bourbons.name: Blood Oath Pact (Annual)
bourbons.notes: Annual release. Three bourbons blended with a unique finish.

bourbons.name: Willett Family Estate Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Single barrel releases. Age and proof vary. The older ones are exceptional.

bourbons.name: Belle Meade Reserve Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Cask strength MGP-sourced. Excellent value.

bourbons.name: Rabbit Hole Dareringer
bourbons.notes: Finished in PX sherry casks. Unique flavor profile.

bourbons.name: Old Elk Wheated Bourbon
bourbons.notes: High wheat content (34%). Smooth profile.

bourbons.name: Garrison Brothers Balmorhea
bourbons.notes: Texas bourbon finished in port casks. Twice-barreled.

bourbons.name: Kentucky Owl Batch Series
bourbons.notes: Numbered batch releases. Premium blended bourbon.

bourbons.name: Old Carter Straight Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Small batch releases. Sourced and blended. Very limited.

bourbons.name: Heaven's Door Bootleg Series
bourbons.notes: Bob Dylan's whiskey brand. Bootleg series is ultra-premium.

bourbons.name: Blue Run 14 Year Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Limited release. Jim Rutledge collaboration.

bourbons.name: Sam Houston 15 Year
bourbons.notes: Aged bourbon sourced and bottled at high proof.

bourbons.name: Widow Jane 10 Year
bourbons.notes: Brooklyn-based. Blended from KY, TN, and IN distillate. Limestone water.

bourbons.name: Yellowstone Limited Edition
bourbons.notes: Annual limited release. Different finish each year.

bourbons.name: Buffalo Trace Single Barrel Select
bourbons.notes: Store pick program. Selected individual barrels. Better than standard BT.

bourbons.name: Maker's Mark Private Select
bourbons.notes: Custom stave profile store picks. Each selection is unique.

bourbons.name: Jim Beam Lineage
bourbons.notes: Premium Beam expression. Batch #2 praised as best classic Beam ever.

bourbons.name: 1792 Full Proof
bourbons.notes: Barrel entry proof bourbon. High proof, great value.

bourbons.name: 1792 Sweet Wheat
bourbons.notes: Wheated mashbill from Barton. Very limited releases.

bourbons.name: Woodinville Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Washington state bourbon. 100% corn sourced from single farm. Sleeper pick.

bourbons.name: Last Drop Bourbon
bourbons.notes: Ultra-premium. Highest rated by Breaking Bourbon. Extremely rare.

bourbons.name: FWGS Chairman's Selection Bourbon (Various)
bourbons.notes: PA-exclusive barrel picks selected by PLCB. Store-specific. Often excellent value.
